meanings.definition: A skin infection characterized by ulcerative lesions.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with ecthyma after examining the ulcerative lesions.
meanings.sent2: The ecthyma on his skin was painful and needed medical attention.
meanings.sent3: The ecthyma on his skin seemed to have a mind of its own, causing trouble.
meanings.sent4: Her ecthyma was like a stubborn guest that refused to leave the party.
meanings.sent5: The ecthyma spread quickly, leaving a trail of ulcerative lesions behind.

meanings.definition: A type of skin lesion caused by a bacterial infection.

meanings.sent2: Ecthyma can be treated with antibiotics to clear the bacterial infection.
meanings.sent3: The ecthyma lesion on his arm seemed to have a personality of its own, causing mischief.
meanings.sent4: Her ecthyma was like a warning sign of the lurking bacterial infection within.
meanings.sent5: The ecthyma lesion grew rapidly, a clear sign of the bacterial infection spreading.

meanings.definition: A skin condition that results in painful sores.

meanings.sent2: Ecthyma can cause discomfort and itching due to the painful sores.
meanings.sent3: The ecthyma sores on his skin seemed to have a mischievous nature, causing trouble.
